00037         typedef VectorIterator<std::list<Widget*> > WidgetIterator;
00038 
00040         class OUTILS_API Container: public Widget
00041         {
00042         friend class UIManager;
00043         public:
00044                 enum Layout {LayoutFree, LayoutHorizontal, LayoutVertical, LayoutGridHorizontal, LayoutGridVertical};
00045                 enum HorizontalAlign { AlignRight, AlignLeft, AlignCenter};
00046                 enum VerticalAlign { AlignTop, AlignMiddle, AlignBottom};
00047 
00048         public:
00049                 Container(omega::String name);
00050                 virtual ~Container();
00051 
00052                 void load(Setting& setting);
00053 
00055 
00056 
00057                 void addChild(Widget* child);
00059                 void removeChild(Widget* child);
00060                 void removeChild(const String& name);
00062                 int getNumChildren();

00065                 Widget* getChildByIndex(int index);
00067 
00069 
00070                 void setLayout(Layout layout);

00073                 float getMargin();

00078                 VerticalAlign getVerticalAlign();
00079                 void setVerticalAlign(VerticalAlign value);

00081                 int getGridColumns();

00083                 void setGridColumns(int value);
00085

00087                 virtual void setUIManager(UIManager* ui);
00088                 virtual void updateSize();
00089 
00090         protected:
00091                 virtual bool processInputEvent(const omega::Event& evt);
00092                 virtual void update(const omega::UpdateContext& context);
00093                 virtual void layout();
00094 
00095         private:
00096                 int expandStep(int childSpace, Orientation orientation);
00097                 void updateChildrenLayoutPosition(Orientation orientation);
00098                 void updateChildrenFreeBounds(Orientation orientation);

00101                 void computeGridLayout(Orientation orientation);
00102

00104                 std::list<Widget*> myChildren;
00105                 Layout myLayout;
00106                 float myPadding;
00107                 float myMargin;
00108                 int myGridRows;
00109                 int myGridColumns;
00110                 HorizontalAlign myHorizontalAlign;
00111                 VerticalAlign myVerticalAlign;
00112         };
00113 
00115         inline int Container::getNumChildren() 
00116         { return myChildren.size(); }
00117

00120         { myLayout = layout; }
